vclaim: A medical examiner's conclusion that Health and Human Services drug pricing adviser Daniel Best died of multiple blunt force injuries contradicts the official ruling that he committed suicide.
title: Was HHS Drug Pricing Czar Daniel Best’s Death Ruled a Suicide Despite Evidence of Foul Play?
subtitle: Conspiracy theorists pointed to a medical examiner's report saying Best died of 'multiple blunt force injuries.'
author: David Emery
